participant_1.background:
I want a modern and stylish home that reflects my vibrant personality.
I love playing with my husky.
my hobby is sewing.
I make a batch of my favorite soap and smell it while I relax.
My youthful appearance and my interesting stories make me a good conversationalist.

participant_2.background:
I'm majoring in business and love to lamp, but the hardest thing I've ever done was trying to explain this to my parents.
I enjoy cooking for my beloved cat and dog.
i want to visit rome , but i cannot make myself go alone.
i am a vet tech.
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.

content.text: I like to cook for my dog and my cat.
Me too! I am a vet tech, so I know a lot about animals. What do you cook for them?
I usually just make them chicken or fish. What do you cook for yours?
I like to make them tuna with some shredded cheese on top.
That sounds delicious! What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and poems. I would like to be published one day.
That's awesome! I like to write too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't be so hard on yourself! Everyone has to start somewhere.
You're welcome! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a husky named Luna. She's the sweetest dog ever!
I love huskies! They're so beautiful.
They are! They're also very smart.
Do you want to go visit Rome together? I'm going to be there for a few days.
That sounds amazing! I would love to go with you!
Great! We can make it a girls trip.
Sounds like a plan! I can't wait
